Text: Western Coal Cc Here is the information that you guys had asked about last week when we discussed WSCC coal I added the railroads to the map and pulled some numbers for utilization and OM costs for each of the plants we discussed If you have any other questions let me know Aaron Martinsen

Week ResultsTrevor Woods wins tie breaker over Phillip Berry One more week to go

FW ThanksgivingToday is CFOs Day A uniquely American concept it is one that I personally value the most It has no business justification and is not tied to any shareholder value It does not spring from common sense and carries with it very little baggage No value is received by the company disclosures are few and spare it reminds us that for senior management there is little commercial incentive not to buy travel celebrate or do anything to excess The possible exceptions are the temptations to perform rationally or honestly CFO Day is a day specifically set aside to ponder our good fortune As most of you know it was first held in New England a bountiful feast during which the American forefathers stole money land and resources from Native Americans appropriating their good harvest for their own ends Senior Management celebrates this day still to remind us of the values which we must try to make our own This is a very difficult time for all you left at Enron I want to take a few minutes of your time to share with you some of my thoughts for even now it is important to count our blessings and recall some of the many things for which we can be thankful I am thankful for the way all of you have selflessly contributed to my retirement fund I am moved by the dollars many of you have shared with me I have been impressed by your willingness to look forward stay the course ignore GAAP requirements and maintain your stock purchase payments Your loyalty and naivety have sustained me during some of my darkest moments I am grateful for friends family and the opportunity to live and work in a free and open society whereas by rights I should be living and working in an open prison Mostly I am so very proud of you your talents your flexibility your work ethic your willingness to hang in there when things seemed to be spinning out of control Thanks for constantly reminding me how lucky I was to be working with such suckers Andy Fastow

College Football PoolWe are putting together a college football pool that will run every week as well as keep an ongoing cumulative score The tentative plan is to have it be man paid upfront with weekly payouts of of the pot for the high score and rolling the other of the pot into the cumulative total which pays out places for the whole season Sep Nov You will pick games per week assigning each game a priority of All games will have the line as set by the friday edition of the US Today The scoring will then be based on the priority values eg If my and priority games win I score points for the week The weekly payout will be to st place unless there is a tie the total difference between your scores and the lines for all games will be used to decide the winner The cumulative payout will be for st for nd and for rd of the remaining pot We are hoping to get at least people which would be like week and have left in the pot at the end for the cumulative leaders If you are interested let me know asap and also invite whoever else you can think of the more the better and we can maybe get the weekly payout to be more than the entry fee

College Football Pool Cc The pool will be starting this Thursday and running through Try to pay up asap each Either give the money to me or Derek Wilson The official rules are as follows The lines for all games other than Thursdays will be Danny Sheridans from the Friday edition of the USA Today for the Thursday games the lines will also be Danny Sheridans but from the Thursday edition of the USA Today These are the only games you can choose from You must pick different games a week against the spread in rule and assign priorities of In other words the game you are most sure of you would assign a priority and least sure of assign a priority The priority selections of the games you win are totalled up to determine your weekly score For example if your priority and priority game cover the spread for the week and the and do not then you will have a weekly score of All picks must be in by pm on Thursday for Thursday games and pm on Friday for weekend games Send your selections to or call Derek Wilson x Mark Friedman x or Aaron Martinsen x if you are on the road or do not have email access for some reason This is so we can reply to everyone on Friday with a summary of everyones picks for the week If you do not select teams by the deadline your teams and their priority for the prior week will roll into the current week If one of your previous weeks teams has a bye or doesnt have a spread in Sheridans odds you receive a for that game If your team pushes you lose you must BEAT the spread The high score for the week collects the weeks winnings should be as long as no one flakes If there is a tie the winner is decided by the game cumulative margin of victory against the spread with each game margin of victory being equally weighted If there is still a tie those players will split the weekly winnings The remainder of the pot will be split up at the end w to st to nd and to rd
